wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Vere Richard Nicoll (1770 – 22 October 1841) was an English amateur cricketer who made 12 known appearances in first-class cricket matches from 1790 to 1794. He was mainly associated with Marylebone Cricket Club of which he was an early member.

link_mentions.page: List of Marylebone Cricket Club players (1787–1826)
response: * Thomas Nicoll (1792–1796) : T. V. R. Nicoll (Middlesex)
